Class Drawer

java.lang.Object
Drawer
public class Drawer
extends java.lang.Object
A cash drawer for a business. Has a currencies and an item price as long with methods to process a transaction.
Author:
Wil Simpson

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Currencies drawerCurrencies
    Sorted map of every currency and the amount of each
    private static java.text.DecimalFormat FORMATTER
    Decimal format that will be used
    private float itemPrice
    Price of the item in the drawer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Drawer()
    Initialize the draw to have a random amount of each currency between 0 and 15 with an item price of $1
    Drawer​(float itemPrice)
    Initialize the draw to have a random amount of each currency between 0 and 15 and sets the item price to the given item price

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static float formatFloat​(float f)
    Rounds the given float to the nearest cent
    void printDrawerContents()
    Prints the contents of the drawer
    Currencies processTransaction​(Currencies moneyGiven)
    Processes a transaction with the given money.
    void setItemPrice​(float itemPrice)
    Sets the price of the item

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      private Currencies drawerCurrencies
      Sorted map of every currency and the amount of each

    • itemPrice

      private float itemPrice
      Price of the item in the drawer

  • Constructor Details

    • Drawer

      public Drawer()
      Initialize the draw to have a random amount of each currency between 0 and 15 with an item price of $1

    • Drawer

      public Drawer​(float itemPrice)
      Initialize the draw to have a random amount of each currency between 0 and 15 and sets the item price to the given item price
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - price of the item in the drawer

  • Method Details

    • printDrawerContents

      public void printDrawerContents()
      Prints the contents of the drawer

    • setItemPrice

      public void setItemPrice​(float itemPrice)
      Sets the price of the item
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - new price for the item

    • processTransaction

      public Currencies processTransaction​(Currencies moneyGiven) throws TransactionException
      Processes a transaction with the given money. If the given money is not enough or the drawer does not have the correct change then the transaction will not be processed, the drawer will not be effected and a TransactionException will be thrown
      Parameters:
      moneyGiven - currencies given to pay for the item
      Returns:
      currencies given as change
      Throws:
      TransactionException - throws an error if a transaction fails for some reason

    • formatFloat

      public static float formatFloat​(float f)
      Rounds the given float to the nearest cent
      Parameters:
      f - number to format
      Returns:
      float rounded to the nearest cent
